Package no.uis.party

Class Party

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.uis.party.Party
  • public class Party
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the game state data of the guesser and proposer.
    Author:
    Alan Rostem

      Constructors

      Party()

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update​(org.springframework.messaging.simp.SimpMessageSendingOperations smos,
                   ScoreBoardRepository scoreBoardRepository)
        Sequential update method that updates the game logic. Sends data to the players and saves to the scoreboard when a game has finished. This is executed via a TickExecution
        Parameters:
        smos - Messaging operation object to send data via websocket
        scoreBoardRepository - The repository to store the score data
        See Also:
        TickExecution

        smos - Messaging operation object to send data via websocket
